The JCMS series

The Joint Condensed Matter Seminar (JCMS) series is organised by KTH Royal Insitute of Technology, Nordita, and Stockholm University.

Homepage Calendar

    The JCMS events

    The choice of speakers is still in progress.
    We would like to hear about your interests: if you have a speaker to suggest, let us know by sending an email to the organising team!

    A complete list of our past and future events can be found in the following.

    To not miss any of our events, synchronize your devices with our Google Calendar!
